posts.post_content: Well, there wasn't exactly room for the shocklands in this set, not unless WotC was willing to crimp one rare from each color (the other five slots would be displacing the [Glacial Fortress](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Glacial Fortress) cycle).
